channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One-time gene therapy could end lifelong transfusions for rare blood disease

item.title: Flu vaccine rates may increase with acknowledging regret, study finds
item.description: Asking people to imagine future regret could be a powerful tool for increasing flu vaccination rates, according to new research from SMU.
